title: Agritech Startups in Africa: A Detailed Report
description: Agriculture remains a cornerstone of many African economies, playing a critical role in food security, employment, and economic development. In recent years, the intersection of agriculture and technology has given rise to the agritech sector, which aims to innovate and improve agricultural practices through technological solutions. This report investigates prominent agritech startups in Africa, highlighting their contributions, innovation, and impact.
